https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/Auy7qUkMKFQkgUPFD6cldNjjYGN.jpg This Bronx-based coming-of-age drama follows four high school friends as they navigate the treacherous waters of independence, love and careers on their individual paths toward achieving their dreams. Cross Bronx
